item.title: Americano
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 45 ml Campari
  • 45 ml sweet vermouth
  • 45 ml soda water
  • (garnish) orange slice

Instructions

Build in rocks glass over ice. Garnish.

item.title: Artist's special
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 15 ml lemon juice

Instructions

Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in cocktail glass. Garnish.

Instructions

item.title: Martini
item.description:
This is a “traditional” Martini with a greater amount of vermouth than is common today. Decrease the vermouth as you see fit. Make sure the drink and glass are cold.

Ingredients

  • 60 ml gin
  • 30 ml dry vermouth
  • 2 dashes orange bitters
  • (garnish) lemon twist or olives

Instructions

Stir ingredients over ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Mojito
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rum
  • 20 ml lime juice
  • 20 ml sugar syrup
  • a few mint leaves
  • soda water
  • (garnish) mint sprig

Instructions

Crush ice in clean tea towel. Lightly clap mint. Add ingredients except soda to highball glass. Add crushed ice and stir briefly, and top with soda water. Garnish.

item.title: Paloma
item.description:
You can make the drink fancy by substituting the grapefruit soda for a combination of grapefruit juice, agave syrup, and soda water.

Ingredients

  • 60 ml tequila
  • 120 ml grapefruit soda
  • 5 ml lime juice
  • pinch of salt
  • (garnish) lime wedge

Instructions

Mix together in a highball glass over ice. Garnish.

item.title: Paper plane
item.description:

Ingredients

  • 20ml Aperol
  • 20ml Amaro Nonino
  • 20ml lemon juice
  • (garnish) lemon twist or miniature paper plane

Instructions

Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish.
